author: dependabot-preview[bot]
body:
Bumps [PowerShellGet](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShellGet) from 1.6.7 to 2.1.5.
Changelog *Sourced from [PowerShellGet's changelog](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShellGet/blob/development/CHANGELOG.md).* > ## 2.1.5 > > New Features > > - Add and remove nuget based repositories as a nuget source when nuget client tool is installed ([#498](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShellGet/issues/498)) > > Bug Fix > > - Fix for 'Failed to publish module' error thrown when publishing modules ([#497](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShellGet/issues/497)) > > ## 2.1.4 > > Bug Fix > > - Fixed hang when publishing some modules ([#478](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShellGet/issues/478)) > > ## 2.1.3 > > New Features > > - Added -Scope parameter to Update-Module (Thanks [@​lwajswaj](https://github.com/lwajswaj)!) ([#471](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShellGet/issues/471)) > - Added -Exclude parameter to Publish-Module (Thanks [@​Benny1007](https://github.com/Benny1007)!) ([#191](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShellGet/issues/191)) > - Added -SkipAutomticTags parameter to Publish-Module (Thanks [@​awickham10](https://github.com/awickham10)!) ([#452](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShellGet/issues/452)) > > Bug Fix > > - Fixed issue with finding modules using macOS and .NET Core 3.0 > > ## 2.1.2 > > New Feature > > - Added support for registering repositories with special characters ([@​Thanks](https://github.com/Thanks) jborean93!) ([#442](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShellGet/issues/442)) > > ## 2.1.1 > > - Fix DSC resource folder structure > > ## 2.1.0 > > Breaking Change > > - Default installation scope for Update-Module and Update-Script has changed to match Install-Module and Install-Script. For Windows PowerShell (version 5.1 or below), the default scope is AllUsers when running in an elevated session, and CurrentUser at all other times. > For PowerShell version 6.0.0 and above, the default installation scope is always CurrentUser. ([#421](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShellGet/issues/421)) > > Bug Fixes > > - Update-ModuleManifest no longer clears FunctionsToExport, AliasesToExport, nor NestModules ([#415](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShellGet/issues/415) & [#425](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShellGet/issues/425)) (Thanks [@​pougetat](https://github.com/pougetat) and [@​tnieto88](https://github.com/tnieto88)!) > - Update-Module no longer changes repository URL ([#407](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShellGet/issues/407)) > - Update-ModuleManifest no longer preprends 'PSGet_' to module name ([#403](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShellGet/issues/403)) (Thanks [@​ThePoShWolf](https://github.com/ThePoShWolf)) > ... (truncated)
Commits - See full diff in [compare view](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShellGet/commits)

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://api.dependabot.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=PowerShellGet&package-manager=nuget&previous-version=1.6.7&new-version=2.1.5)](https://dependabot.com/compatibility-score.html?dependency-name=PowerShellGet&package-manager=nuget&previous-version=1.6.7&new-version=2.1.5) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot ignore this [patch|minor|major] version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor/major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot badge me` will comment on this PR with code to add a "Dependabot enabled" badge to your readme Additionally, you can set the following in the `.dependabot/config.yml` file in this repo: - Update frequency (including time of day and day of week) - Automerge options (never/patch/minor, and dev/runtime dependencies) - Pull request limits (per update run and/or open at any time) - Out-of-range updates (receive only lockfile updates, if desired) - Security updates (receive only security updates, if desired) Finally, you can contact us by mentioning @dependabot.

comments.author: dependabot-preview[bot]
comments.body: OK, I won't notify you about version 2.x.x again, unless you re-open this PR or update to a 2.x.x release yourself.

title: Build(deps): Bump PowerShellGet from 1.6.7 to 2.1.5 in /src/Modules
